cards.flavor_text: [i]Bestowed upon the Chosen Undead destined to succeed Lord Gwyn.[/i]
[i]Darkroot Garden is home to many hunters. It is also the final resting place of Abyswalker Artorias. His gravesite watched faithfully by Sif.[/i]
[i]Lordran is where kingdoms converge. Many Undead travel great distances to reach this far away land, where the First Flame waits to be linked.[/i]
[i]The Great Swamp is inhospitable. Unwanted by all save who live there. Populated by outcasts and exiles, they share common interests in shamanism.[/i]
[i]Ash lake is hidden away, beyond the Great Hollow. It is home to the Path of the Dragon covenant and perhaps a survivor of the Age of Ancients.[/i]
[i]Catarina is known for its festivities, drinks, and the peculiar armor of its knights. They take pride in their appearance, despite mockery.[/i]
